title: AI for HPLC Method Development
summary: How AI can help analytical chemists optimize HPLC methods faster and reduce trial-and-error.

title: Learn AI the Easy Way: AI For Everyone by Andrew Ng
summary: AI is changing the way we live and work faster than most people can keep up. We see headlines about ChatGPT, generative AI, and automation every day—but understanding what’s actually happening is not easy.
